item.title: An In Depth Analysis of FIFA 19
item.description: This post was originally released on the Kaggle FIFA 19 Complete Player dataset that was kindly collected by Karan Gadiya. Many thanks Karan. The link to my original kernel is here The full code base can be found here Introduction From Wikipedia: FIFA 19 is a football simulation video game developed by EA Vancouver as part of Electronic Artsâ€™ FIFA series. Announced on 6 June 2018 for its E3 2018 press conference, it was released on 28 September 2018 for PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and Microsoft Windows.
